articles.description: Our picks also include The Snoopy Show, season finales for Mrs. Maisel and HIMYF, the Critics' Choice Awards, and Netflix true-crime docuseries Bad Vegan
articles.content:
Welcome to Whats On, our weekly picks of must-watch shows for the next seven days. Heres whats you need to watch from Friday, March 11 to Thursday, March 17. All times are Eastern. Happy viewing.
